body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture             History & Culture         This 1935 photo shows a portion of the Old Trace that was modernized in Claiborne County, Mississippi. NPS  The history and culture found along the Natchez Trace Parkway is a lifetime worth of exploration for students of history, or just the curious.  The number of cultures and historic topics touched by the Natchez Trace seems boundless.  To begin your exploration, visit the stories section and let yourself use centuries as stepping stones to learn about the past.
title: Natchez Trace Parkway: History & Culture
